alert.note: Alert for Butte; Meade; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:11PM MDT until June 29 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR EASTERN BUTTE...NORTH CENTRAL MEADE AND WESTERN PERKINS COUNTIES... At 611 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Prairie City to 3 miles northeast of Date to 3 miles south of Mud Butte, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bison, Maurine, Prairie City, Mud Butte, Date, Owen Lake and northwestern Shadehill Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
